Two (2) ‘A’ level passes 
in History and any 
other related subjects.  
  
Five (5) SSC credit passes to 
include History and English 
Language.  
  
History and any 
other two subjects 
from Arts and  
Social Sciences.  
  
DIRECT ENTRY  
(i) ABU accepts two (2) ‘A’ level passes including  
History at IJMB or NCE.General English/Use of 
English at NCE, satisfiesthe UTME English 
Language requirement.  
(ii) ABUJA accepts   
a) ND lower credit with the UTME 
requirements plus two (2) years post 
qualification.  
b) a minimum of ten (10) points in NCE or ND 
upper credit in addition to the UTME 
requirements or two (2) ‘A’ level credit 
passes including History or Government and 
one (1) other Arts subject.  
(iii) BENIN accepts 'A' level pass in Government in 
lieu of History, NCE credit in History; 
Government or Social Studies.   
(iv) FED-DUTSINMA requires two (2) ‘A’ level passes 
in History or/and Government and any other 
related subject. It also accepts ND/NCE with 
good grades in any relevant progamme/subject.
